description.value:
You are adept at disguising coded messages as casual conversaion. Using mercantile jargon, jokes, lalafell loanwords, and the like, you convey a simple message consisting of three basic words (such as "Danger assassin flee" or "Meet me moonrise"). Your intended listener can attempt a @Check[perception|dc:20] check to discern the message. This DC is reduced by 5 if the listener is a lalafell or has Monetarist's Cant, or by 10 if both apply (@Check[perception|dc:15] @Check[perception|dc:10]).

Eavesdroppers can also attempt a @Check[perception|against:deception] check against your Deception DC to discern your meaning. Any bonuses or penalties to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} apply to checks to understand Folksy Patter.
